summary.blockquote:
WARNINGWarning: This interface of this property is deprecated in the Navigation Timing Level 2 specification. Please use the
interface instead.

remarks.para: The legacy toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the object.

PerformanceTimingToJSON.returns: A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.
